budget.name: budget
budget.description: keyword to specify that record corresponds to the budget.

fileout.name: fileout
fileout.description: keyword to specify that an output filename is expected next.

budgetfile.name: budgetfile
budgetfile.description: name of the output file to write budget information.

budgetcsv.name: budgetcsv
budgetcsv.description: keyword to specify that record corresponds to the budget CSV.

budgetcsvfile.name: budgetcsvfile
budgetcsvfile.description: name of the comma-separated value (CSV) output file to write budget summary information.  A budget summary record will be written to this file for each time step of the simulation.

concentration.name: concentration
concentration.description: keyword to specify that record corresponds to concentration.

concentrationfile.name: concentrationfile
concentrationfile.description: name of the output file to write conc information.

print_format.name: print_format
print_format.longname: keyword to indicate that a print format follows
print_format.description: keyword to specify format for printing to the listing file.

columns.name: columns
columns.description: number of columns for writing data.

digits.name: digits
digits.description: number of digits to use for writing a number.

format.name: format
format.description: write format can be EXPONENTIAL, FIXED, GENERAL, or SCIENTIFIC.

iper.name: iper
iper.description: integer value specifying the starting stress period number for which the data specified in the PERIOD block apply.  IPER must be less than or equal to NPER in the TDIS Package and greater than zero.  The IPER value assigned to a stress period block must be greater than the IPER value assigned for the previous PERIOD block.  The information specified in the PERIOD block will continue to apply for all subsequent stress periods, unless the program encounters another PERIOD block.

save.name: save
save.description: keyword to indicate that information will be saved this stress period.

print.name: print
print.description: keyword to indicate that information will be printed this stress period.

rtype.name: rtype
rtype.description: type of information to save or print.  Can be BUDGET or CONCENTRATION.

ocsetting.name: ocsetting
ocsetting.type: keystring all first last frequency steps
ocsetting.description: specifies the steps for which the data will be saved.

all.name: all
all.description: keyword to indicate save for all time steps in period.

first.name: first
first.description: keyword to indicate save for first step in period. This keyword may be used in conjunction with other keywords to print or save results for multiple time steps.

last.name: last
last.description: keyword to indicate save for last step in period. This keyword may be used in conjunction with other keywords to print or save results for multiple time steps.

frequency.name: frequency
frequency.description: save at the specified time step frequency. This keyword may be used in conjunction with other keywords to print or save results for multiple time steps.

steps.name: steps
steps.description: save for each step specified in STEPS. This keyword may be used in conjunction with other keywords to print or save results for multiple time steps.
